name: Perl: Avoid too many Subroutine in a single Program
description: Programs should have less than X Subroutines. The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output: This report lists all the Programs having more than X Subroutines. It provides the following information: Program full name, number of Subroutines.
rationale: For maintainability and readability reasons, Programs should not have too many Subroutines
remediation: Review the Program design to reduce the number of Subroutines
